item.title: 发表 "白人种族灭绝 "言论后，马斯克的 xAI 更新了 Grok 聊天机器人
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）旗下的xAI公司回应了有关其Grok聊天机器人宣称对南非白人公民实施种族灭绝的广泛报道，称该人工智能机器人曾发生过未经授权的更改。xAI 周四在 X 上发文称，它将更新系统以解决这一问题。【原文：Elon Musk's xAI responded to widespread reports that its Grok chatbot made claims about a genocide against white citizens in South Africa, saying there had been an unauthorized change to the artificial intelligence bot. In a post on X on Thursday, xAI said it would update the system to address the problem.】

item.title: Capital One 将支付 4.25 亿美元解决储蓄账户诉讼
item.description: Capital One 同意支付 4.25 亿美元，以了结全国范围内的诉讼，该诉讼指控 Capital One 欺骗储蓄账户储户，不告诉他们可以把钱转到收益更高的账户，从而使他们无法获得更高的利率。【原文：Capital One agreed to pay $425 million to settle nationwide litigation accusing it of cheating savings account depositors out of much higher interest rates by not telling them they could move their money to higher-yielding accounts.】

item.title: 顶级投资人库恩表示，汉莎航空管理层应对工会更加强硬
item.description: 周六，德国汉莎航空公司（Lufthansa）的顶级投资人克劳斯-迈克尔-库恩（Klaus-Michael Kuehne）在谈到该公司的股价时说，汉莎航空的管理层应该更加积极地抵制劳工代表的阻力。【原文：Lufthansa's management should be more vigorous in fending off resistance from labour representatives, top investor Klaus-Michael Kuehne was quoted as saying on Saturday, pointing to the airline group's share price.】

item.title: 美国联邦航空局将在航空公司会议后宣布临时削减纽瓦克机场航班数量
item.description: 美国联邦航空管理局周五表示，计划在与美国主要航空公司会面后宣布暂时削减纽瓦克机场航班的建议，以解决拥堵造成的影响。【原文：The Federal Aviation Administration said Friday it plans to announce proposed temporary cuts to flights at Newark after meetings with major U.S. airlines to address congestion impacts.】

item.title: 上诉法官就 CFPB 清盘问题敦促特朗普政府和工会
item.description: 华盛顿联邦上诉法院的法官们周五就他们能在多大程度上指示特朗普政府运营政府的消费者金融监督机构展开了争论。【原文：Federal appeals court judges in Washington wrestled Friday with the extent to which they could instruct the Trump administration to operate the government's consumer finance watchdog agency, which the White House this year has sought to decimate if not shut down entirely.】

item.title: 数据显示，3月份外国持有的美国国债高达9万亿美元
item.description: 美国财政部周五公布的数据显示，3月份外国持有的美国国债飙升至历史新高，连续第三个月上升，原因是在唐纳德-特朗普总统上台几个月后，对美国国债的需求依然强劲。【原文：Foreign holdings of U.S. Treasuries soared to a record high in March, data from the Treasury Department showed on Friday, rising for a third straight month, as demand for U.S. government debt remained robust a few months after President Donald Trump took office.】

item.title: VIEW 穆迪下调评级，美国失去宝贵的 Aaa 信用评级
item.description: 穆迪（Moody's）周五将美国的信用评级从 "Aaa "下调一级至 "Aa1"，理由是不断上升的债务和利息 "明显高于类似评级的主权国家"。【原文：Moody's on Friday downgraded the credit rating of the United States by a notch to "Aa1" from "Aaa", citing rising debt and interest "that are significantly higher than similarly rated sovereigns".】

item.title: 南加州爱迪生公司提交三年野火减灾计划
item.description: 爱迪生国际公司（Edison International）旗下的南加州爱迪生公司（SCE）周五表示，该公司已向加州能源基础设施安全办公室提交了一份为期三年的野火缓解计划。【原文：Southern California Edison (SCE), a unit of utility Edison International , said on Friday it has submitted a three-year Wildfire Mitigation Plan to California's Office of Energy Infrastructure Safety.】

item.title: 人工智能监管禁令遭州总检察长反对 美国消费者面临风险
item.description: 周五，共和党提出的一项阻止各州在 10 年内对人工智能进行监管的提案，遭到了由加利福尼亚州、纽约州、俄亥俄州和其他已对人工智能技术的高风险用途进行监管的州的总检察长组成的两党团体的反对。【原文：A Republican proposal to block states from regulating artificial intelligence for 10 years drew opposition on Friday from a bipartisan group of attorneys general in California, New York, Ohio and other states that have regulated high-risk uses of the technology.】

item.title: 穆迪下调美国信用评级，将其挤出 "AAA "精英俱乐部
item.description: 穆迪（Moody's）周五将美国的信用评级从 "Aaa "下调一级至 "Aa1"，理由是不断上升的债务和利息 "明显高于类似评级的主权国家"。【原文：Moody's on Friday downgraded the credit rating of the United States by a notch to "Aa1" from "Aaa", citing rising debt and interest "that are significantly higher than similarly rated sovereigns".】

item.title: 交易日：市场欣喜战胜酝酿中的滞胀
item.description: - 交易日【原文：- TRADING DAY】

item.title: 国防和太空技术公司 Voyager Technologies 申请在美国上市
item.description: 根据周五提交的一份监管文件，国防技术和空间解决方案公司 Voyager Technologies 已申请在美国进行首次公开募股。【原文：Defense technology and space solutions company Voyager Technologies has filed for an initial public offering in the United States, according to a regulatory filing made on Friday.】

item.title: 美国联邦储备委员会计划在未来几年裁员 10
item.description: 根据美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）周五发给员工的一份备忘录，美联储计划在未来几年内缩减约10%的员工人数，使美国中央银行与唐纳德-特朗普总统精简联邦政府的大政方针保持一致。【原文：The Federal Reserve plans to shrink its workforce by about 10% over the coming years, bringing the U.S. central bank in line with President Donald Trump's broader efforts to streamline the federal government, according to a memo that Fed Chairman Jerome Powell sent to staff on Friday.】

item.title: 分析师称诺和诺德应在美国寻找下一任首席执行官
item.description: 分析师告诉路透社记者，丹麦诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk）正在物色下一任首席执行官来接替拉尔斯-弗鲁尔加德-约根森（Lars Fruergaard Jorgensen），该公司应该在大西洋彼岸寻找一位在其最大市场美国根深蒂固的领导者。【原文：As Denmark's Novo Nordisk shops for its next CEO to replace Lars Fruergaard Jorgensen, it should look across the Atlantic for a leader deeply entrenched in the United States, by far its largest market, analysts told Reuters.】

item.title: 中美贸易缓和令需求回升，集装箱船船东忙得不可开交
item.description: 运营商表示，自上周末中美两国宣布就针锋相对的惩罚性关税休战90天以来，中国至美国的集装箱船预订量激增，导致中国港口和工厂的交通堵塞，可能需要数周时间才能疏通。【原文：Container ship bookings for China-to-U.S. cargo have surged since the countries declared a 90-day truce on punitive tit-for-tat tariffs last weekend, operators said, spawning traffic jams at Chinese ports and factories that could take weeks to clear.】

item.title: 禽流感爆发后阿根廷停止进口巴西家禽
item.description: 阿根廷国家卫生机构 Senasa 周五下令暂停从巴西进口禽源产品和副产品，巴西是世界上最大的鸡肉出口国，数小时前证实其一个商业家禽农场首次爆发禽流感。【原文：Argentina's state sanitation agency Senasa on Friday ordered a suspension of imports of products and byproducts of avian origin from Brazil, the world's largest chicken exporter that hours earlier confirmed its first outbreak of bird flu on a commercial poultry farm.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，OpenAI 将帮助阿联酋开发全球最大的数据中心之一
item.description: 据彭博新闻社（Bloomberg News）周五报道，OpenAI 计划帮助阿联酋开发一个新的大型数据中心，该中心最终可能成为世界上最大的数据中心之一。【原文：OpenAI plans to help develop a massive new data center in the United Arab Emirates that may eventually be one of the largest in the world, Bloomberg News reported on Friday.】

item.title: 达能旗下品牌 Oikos 酸奶进入蛋白奶昔市场
item.description: 达能本周在其 Oikos 酸奶品牌下推出了一种新的蛋白质奶昔，因为竞争对手可口可乐的 Fairlife 和 Chobani 的类似产品受到了消费者和服用减肥药（如维格维）者的欢迎。【原文：Danone introduced a new protein shake under its Oikos yogurt brand this week as rivals Coca-Cola's Fairlife and Chobani with similar products gain popularity with consumers and those taking weight-loss drugs such as Wegovy.】

item.title: 从胰岛素到 Ozempic，诺和诺德首席执行官的发展史
item.description: Ozempic生产商诺和诺德公司周五解除了首席执行官拉尔斯-弗鲁尔加德-约根森（Lars Fruergaard Jorgensen）的职务，原因是该公司担心在竞争激烈的肥胖症药物市场上，美国竞争对手礼来公司（Eli Lilly）正在失去先发优势。【原文：Ozempic-maker Novo Nordisk on Friday ousted its CEO Lars Fruergaard Jorgensen over concerns the company is losing its first-mover advantage in the competitive obesity drug market to American rival Eli Lilly .】

item.title: 消息人士称，瑞银正与客户就特朗普波动造成的外汇衍生品损失进行谈判
item.description: 熟悉内情的消息人士透露，瑞银集团正在商谈赔偿一些客户的损失，因为美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税引发了货币的剧烈波动，这些客户被卖出了复杂的外汇衍生品，导致他们的大部分投资化为乌有。【原文：UBS is in talks to compensate some clients for losses after they were sold complex foreign-exchange derivatives that wiped out much of their investments when U.S. President Donald Trump's tariffs sparked wild moves in currencies, sources familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 迈克-诺沃格拉茨的银河数字公司在纳斯达克上市，加密货币迎来丰收周
item.description: 由迈克-诺沃格拉茨（Mike Novogratz）创立的银河数字公司（Galaxy Digital）周五在纳斯达克首次亮相，为加密货币在公开市场上的重要一周画上了句号，Coinbase 也加入了 S&P 500 指数，零售经纪商 eToro 也上市了。【原文：Galaxy Digital, founded by Mike Novogratz, made its Nasdaq debut on Friday, capping off a momentous week for cryptocurrency in public markets, with Coinbase joining the S&P 500 and retail brokerage eToro also going public.】

item.title: 大空头 "投资者迈克尔-伯里将化妆品制造商雅诗兰黛的股份增加一倍
item.description: 迈克尔-伯里（Michael Burry）的 Scion 资产管理公司已将其在雅诗兰黛的持股翻了一番，而这家美容巨头的新任首席执行官正在指导公司进行转型，以克服北美和中国等主要市场需求疲软的问题。【原文：Michael Burry's Scion Asset Management has doubled its stake in Estee Lauder , at a time when the beauty giant's new CEO is steering the company through a transformation to overcome weak demand in key markets such as North America and China.】

item.title: 关税休战后美国货运业有望提振返校需求
item.description: 专家们说，华盛顿和北京之间为期 90 天的贸易解冻可能会成为美国货运业的一个受欢迎的缓和措施，因为进口商们急于在繁忙的返校期到来之前锁定货物。【原文：A 90-day trade thaw between Washington and Beijing could prove to be a welcome reprieve for the U.S. freight industry, as importers rush to lock in shipments ahead of the busy back-to-school period, experts said.】

item.title: 法国达飞轮船公司（CMA CGM）将重新部署船队以避免美国对中国船只征收港口费
item.description: 法国达飞海运集团（CMA CGM）财务总监表示，该公司将重组其全球船队，以避免美国对中国建造的船只征收港口费。【原文：French shipping group CMA CGM will reorganise its global fleet to avoid U.S. port fees on Chinese-built vessels that are due to take effect from October, the company's finance director said.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，波音公司即将达成避免在致命坠机案中认罪和被起诉的协议
item.description: 据知情人士透露，波音公司已就两起造成 346 人死亡的 737 MAX 飞机坠毁事故引发的欺诈案与美国检方达成了初步的不起诉协议。【原文：Boeing has reached a tentative nonprosecution agreement with U.S. prosecutors in a fraud case stemming from two fatal 737 MAX plane crashes that killed 346 people, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 美国 5 月消费者情绪进一步恶化
item.description: 由于家庭仍然担心唐纳德-特朗普总统咄咄逼人且经常反复无常的贸易政策对经济的影响，美国消费者情绪在5月份进一步下滑，而一年期通胀预期飙升。【原文：U.S. consumer sentiment slumped further in May while one-year inflation expectations surged as households remained concerned about the economic impact of President Donald Trump's aggressive and often erratic trade policy.】

item.title: Inditex 任命新首席财务官
item.description: Inditex 周五宣布了新的首席财务官和首席可持续发展官，对高层管理人员进行了调整，但没有详细说明变动的原因。【原文：Inditex on Friday announced a new chief financial officer and chief sustainability officer in a top management reshuffle, without detailing any reason for the changes.】

item.title: 消息人士称，Adevinta 正在探索出售其西班牙业务，因为公司所有者正在寻求解体
item.description: 两位知情人士透露，在线分类信息集团 Adevinta 正在探索出售其西班牙业务，因为其私募股权所有者寻求将公司拆分，以专注于三大市场并提高回报。【原文：Online classifieds group Adevinta is exploring the sale of its Spanish business, two sources with knowledge of the talks said, as its private equity owners seek to break-up the company to focus on three main markets and boost returns.】

item.title: 巴西首例商业公司禽流感病例引发中国禁令
item.description: 巴西周五证实，该国南部一个商业养鸡场出现首例高传染性禽流感病毒病例，引发了其主要贸易伙伴中国的临时贸易禁令。【原文：Brazil on Friday confirmed its first case of the highly contagious bird flu virus on a commercial chicken farm in the south of the nation, triggering a temporary trade ban from its main trade partner China.】

item.title: 头条新闻之外：解读特朗普的海湾 "万亿美元
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周五结束了他的海湾之行，白宫称他为美国经济争取到了超过 2 万亿美元的综合交易。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump was wrapping up his Gulf tour on Friday having secured what the White House says is over $2 trillion for the U.S. economy in combined deals.】
